Body:
g = codec.decode(
    """
        (a / alpha
           :ARG0 (b / beta)
           :ARG1 (g / gamma
                    :ARG0 (d / delta)
                    :ARG1-of (e / epsilon)
                    :ARG1-of b))"""
    )
assert not appears_inverted(g, ('a', ':ARG0', 'b'))
assert not appears_inverted(g, ('g', ':ARG0', 'd'))
assert appears_inverted(g, ('e', ':ARG1', 'g'))
assert appears_inverted(g, ('b', ':ARG1', 'g'))
